00040 if ($_POST) {
00041     foreach ($_POST['Services'] as $Service) {
00042         if ($_POST['>>']) {
00043             $View->Controller($Status, 'DisableService', $Service);
00044         }
00045         else if ($_POST['<<']) {
00046             $View->Controller($Status, 'EnableService', $Service);
00047         }
00048     }
00049 }
00050 
00051 require_once($VIEW_PATH.'header.php');
00052 
00053 $ServiceDescs= array(
00054     '/usr/local/sbin/dansguardian'  => _TITLE2('Web Filter'),
00055     '/usr/local/sbin/squid'         => _TITLE2('HTTP Proxy'),
00056     '/usr/local/bin/snort'          => _TITLE2('Intrusion Detection'),

00081 if ($View->Controller($Output, 'GetServiceStartStatus')) {
00082     $StartStatus= unserialize($Output[0]);
00083     ?>
00084     <form action="<?php echo $_SERVER['PHP_SELF'] ?>" method="post">
00085         <table style="width: auto;">
00086             <tr>
00087                 <td style="width: 0;">
00088                     <?php
00089                     echo _TITLE('Enabled Services').':';
00090                     ?>
00091                     <br />
00092                     <select name="Services[]" multiple style="width: 250px; height: 350px;">
00093                         <?php
00094                         foreach ($StartStatus as $Service => $Status) {
00095                             if ($Status) {
00096                                 ?>
00097                                 <option value="<?php echo $Service ?>" title="<?php echo $Service ?>"><?php echo _($ServiceDescs[$Service]) ?></option>
00098                                 <?php
00099                             }
00100                         }
00101                         ?>
00102                     </select>
00103                 </td>
00104                 <td style="width: 0;">
00105                     <input type="submit" name=">>" value=">>"/>
00106                     <input type="submit" name="<<" value="<<"/>
00107                 </td>
00108                 <td style="width: 0;">
00109                     <?php
00110                     echo _TITLE('Disabled Services').':';
00111                     ?>
00112                     <br />
00113                     <select name="Services[]" multiple style="width: 250px; height: 350px;">
00114                         <?php
00115                         foreach ($StartStatus as $Service => $Status) {
00116                             if (!$Status) {
00117                                 ?>
00118                                 <option value="<?php echo $Service ?>" title="<?php echo $Service ?>"><?php echo _($ServiceDescs[$Service]) ?></option>
00119                                 <?php
00120                             }
00121                         }
00122                         ?>
00123                     </select>
00124                 </td>
00125             </tr>
00126         </table>
00127     </form>
00128     <?php
00129 }
